items.sentence: Tom is honest. That's one of the reasons that I like him.
Tom didn't expect so many people to show up at his party.
Tomorrow will be the third time I've seen Tom in concert.
Tom didn't call to let me know that he wouldn't be there.
Tom's French has improved a lot in the past three months.
I want to buy the same kind of car that Tom wants to buy.
Let's see if they have a distance-learning French course.
The question is very simple. It's the answer that's hard.
How many stores are within walking distance of your home?
Tom never thought that he'd have to come back here again.
